channel.title: Need Run.Bat Help
channel.description:
Ok well i havent had my server up in about 5 months and then i come and put my server up, did no steps and stuff and it worked fine.
Now today i tryed to put my server up and my friend said on MSN that he couldnt connect.
Usually it was the Run.Bat that was messed up and nobody could connect through it.
I Also have a wireless router so Idk.
If someone could give me a good Run.Bat file thatd be cool.
~Fishys

item.title: Need Run.Bat Help
item.dc:creator: @fishys fishys
item.description:
@fishys wrote:

[quote=“Java Is My Bitch, post:5, topic:161494”]Portforward to your router Ip. Not 192.168.1.1 no! You probably have a dymanic IP, and the ip changes.

Double click:

Then go to support and look at the Ip Address, Port forward to that IP.[/quote]
Is that “my computer?”

Read full topic

item.title: Need Run.Bat Help
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch Java Is My Bitch™
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch wrote:

Portforward to your router Ip. Not 192.168.1.1 no! You probably have a dymanic IP, and the ip changes.

Double click:

Then go to support and look at the Ip Address, Port forward to that IP.

Read full topic

item.title: Need Run.Bat Help
item.dc:creator: @fishys fishys
item.description:
@fishys wrote:

[quote=“Java Is My Bitch™, post:2, topic:161494”]Run.bat doesn’t do shit. Cept run your server, which is like whatever. Tell him to check his computer, he might be the wrong that is wrong.[/quote] I dont understand a word you just said
“He might be wrong that is wrong” wtf?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 29, 2007, 04:14:56 PM[/size][hr]Well it might not be my run.bat, then whatd i do wrong.
MY friend says he still cant connect.
Im using a wireless router.

Read full topic

item.title: Need Run.Bat Help
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

@echo off title (Title Here) java -Xmx512m -cp .;./Class; server pause

Here you go i just got it from some server

~Java is his bitch~

Read full topic

item.title: Need Run.Bat Help
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch Java Is My Bitch™
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch wrote:

Run.bat doesn’t do shit. Cept run your server, which is like whatever. Tell him to check his computer, he might be the wrong that is wrong.

~Bugra52~

Last part didn’t make sense, just read it to myself.

Read full topic
